name: MYR Group Inc.
description: MYR Group Inc. is a leading provider of electrical contracting services, specializing in the transmission and distribution of electricity. Founded in 1891, the company has built a strong reputation for delivering high-quality projects across North America. MYR Group operates through a variety of subsidiaries, providing a comprehensive range of services that include infrastructure construction for electrical utilities, commercial and industrial customers, and renewable energy projects. The company's commitment to safety, quality, and efficiency has positioned it as a trusted partner in the rapidly evolving energy sector. MYR Group is also engaged in the construction of renewable energy facilities, contributing to the transition towards sustainable energy solutions. With a focus on customer satisfaction, the company leverages its extensive experience and technical expertise to execute large-scale projects effectively and on time. MYR Group continues to innovate and adapt to the changing dynamics of the energy market, aiming to enhance its service offerings and expand its market presence in the years to come.

seo.meta_title: MYR Group Inc. | Electrical Contracting and Renewable Energy Services
seo.meta_description: Explore MYR Group Inc., a leader in electrical contracting services and renewable energy projects. Learn about their commitment to safety, quality, and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does MYR Group provide?
faq.answer: MYR Group provides electrical contracting services, including transmission and distribution construction, as well as renewable energy projects.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of MYR Group?
faq.answer: Rick W. Hagan is the CEO of MYR Group Inc.

faq.question: Where is MYR Group headquartered?
faq.answer: MYR Group is headquartered in Henderson, Colorado, USA.
